item.title: A Letter to Fellow ACNA Clergy: On Anti-Racism and a More Diverse and Just Anglicanism
item.description: Following the lead of bishops Jim Hobby, Todd Hunter, Stewart Ruch III, and Steve Wood, who recently wrote in response to the death of George Floyd, which gained support from a number of other bishops, we offer this open letter to our fellow ACNA clergy and to the churches under our care.
